snippet: A study found that colleges were allocating more than half their investments — and almost two-thirds of the largest endowments — to alternative strategies such as hedge funds and private equity.
lead_paragraph: A study found that colleges were allocating more than half their investments — and almost two-thirds of the largest endowments — to alternative strategies such as hedge funds and private equity.

headline.main: Returns on College Endowments Average 15.8 Percent
headline.print_headline: Returns On College Endowments Average 15.8. Percent
